Package Controller

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller<SettingsPanel>
Controller.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Controller<SettingsPanel>
Specialize Controller on SettingsPanel. Class used to get the inputs from the user in the SettingsPanel. It manages the values of the Config and updates the SettingsPanel when they are modified. It also initializes the ChangebleIcon with the icons they need. When the SettingsPanel is closed, the visible panel becomes the last one where the user was
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
